::Sideswipe::
Sideswipe smiled. "It's me", he said, "at least I
think it's me." He looked down at his new body. "Slag,
I'm not sure anymore." He laughed slightly. He looked
up at Ratchet and extended his hand. "It's good to see
you again, old friend."
--- Alloran2@... wrote:
> ::Ratchet's eyes widen as he hears Sideswipes
> voice::
> Ratchet: Sideswipe?
